take_profit.TP_type: Single or multiple TPs, Mixed, Multiple, etc.

stop_loss.order_type: market or limit, or array with both if type is contingency

play_class: SIMPLE, or if conditional: PRIMARY or OTO (if OCO, simply enter it as SIMPLE)

conditional_plays.OCO_trigger: play name of the corresponding OCO conditional play(s)
conditional_plays.OTO_trigger: play name of the corresponding OTO conditional play(s)

status.play_status: TEMP / NEW / OPEN / CLOSED / EXPIRED / whatever
